name: SigmaOS
description: SigmaOS is a productivity-focused web browser designed to enhance workflow efficiency through intelligent tab management and AI-powered tools.
longDescription: SigmaOS is a modern web browser built for macOS that reimagines how users interact with the web by organizing tabs into workspaces for better productivity. Its mission is to make browsing more efficient and less overwhelming, especially for professionals juggling multiple projects and information sources. The browser solves common problems like tab overload by providing features such as automatic tab sorting, quick search, and integrated AI assistants that summarize content or generate insights. It serves users by turning the browser into a central hub for work, reducing the need to switch between apps and improving focus. Overall, SigmaOS aims to transform the traditional browsing experience into a more intelligent, user-centric tool that adapts to individual workflows.
features: Workspaces allow users to group tabs by project or context, reducing clutter and enabling seamless switching between different work modes for enhanced organization.
Intelligent tab management automatically sorts and prioritizes tabs based on usage, helping users maintain focus without manual intervention.
Built-in AI tools provide page summaries, answer questions about content, and generate ideas, saving time on research and comprehension.
Quick search functionality enables instant access to tabs, history, and web results from a unified interface, streamlining information retrieval.
Split-screen views let users compare multiple pages side-by-side, boosting productivity for tasks like research or content creation.
Customizable keyboard shortcuts and gestures offer personalized navigation, making the browser adaptable to individual user preferences.
Integration with macOS features like Continuity ensures smooth transitions between devices, maintaining workflow continuity.
Focus mode minimizes distractions by hiding unnecessary elements, allowing users to concentrate on core tasks.
AI-powered writing assistant helps draft emails or notes directly in the browser, integrating seamlessly with web-based tools.
Secure and private browsing with built-in ad and tracker blocking protects user data while maintaining a clean experience.
Collaborative workspaces enable sharing of tab groups with teams, facilitating group projects and knowledge sharing.

faqs.question: What makes SigmaOS different from other browsers?
faqs.answer: SigmaOS stands out with its workspace-based organization, which groups tabs by context, and AI features that summarize content and answer queries, making it ideal for productivity-focused users. Unlike traditional browsers, it prioritizes workflow efficiency over general browsing.

faqs.question: Is SigmaOS available on all platforms?
faqs.answer: Currently, SigmaOS is primarily available for macOS, with plans for expansion to other platforms. It leverages macOS-specific features for optimal performance.

faqs.question: Does SigmaOS have a free version?
faqs.answer: Yes, SigmaOS offers a free version with core features like workspaces and basic tab management. Advanced AI tools and unlimited workspaces require a Pro subscription.

faqs.question: How does the AI in SigmaOS work?
faqs.answer: The AI integrates directly into the browser to provide summaries of web pages, answer questions based on content, and assist with writing tasks. It uses natural language processing to deliver quick, relevant insights without leaving the tab.

faqs.question: Can I import my data from other browsers?
faqs.answer: Yes, SigmaOS supports importing bookmarks, history, and passwords from browsers like Chrome and Safari for a smooth transition.

faqs.question: Is SigmaOS suitable for team collaboration?
faqs.answer: SigmaOS includes collaborative workspaces where users can share tab groups with others, making it useful for team-based projects and knowledge sharing.

faqs.question: What privacy features does SigmaOS offer?
faqs.answer: It includes built-in ad and tracker blocking to enhance privacy, and all AI processing is designed to keep user data secure without unnecessary sharing.

faqs.question: How do I get started with SigmaOS?
faqs.answer: Download the app from the SigmaOS website, install it on your Mac, and follow the onboarding tutorial to set up your first workspace. You can start with the free version and upgrade later if needed.

faqs.question: Does SigmaOS support extensions?
faqs.answer: SigmaOS supports a range of extensions similar to those in Chrome, allowing users to customize their browsing experience further.

faqs.question: What is the pricing for SigmaOS Pro?
faqs.answer: SigmaOS Pro is available via a subscription model, typically around $10-15 per month, unlocking unlimited features like advanced AI and priority support.
